contest-event.event-date:
May 22, 1899 D Mountain Ash Contest (First Section)
Mountain Ash Contest (First Section) 0 Test Piece Contest
mountain-ash-contest-first-section
None
Attila
Football Ground, Mountain Ash 1st prize £25. 2nd prize £15. 3rd prize £7. 4th prize £2. March contest held in conjunction with 2nd Section 1st (£6) Mountain Ash, 2nd (£3) Aberdare Town, 3rd (£1) Arael Griffin. 5 bands competed.
April 13, 2012, 4:30 p.m. July 27, 2019, 8:39 p.m.
1 Abertillery Silver Henry Bentley
2 Blaina & District F. Hanney
3 Aberdare Town Jesse Manley
4 Tillery Collieries Band John Griffiths
5 Aberaman Thomas Eastwood
